plot: Four landlubbers decide to take a sailboat out, but they don't know how to sail and end up run aground and capsized.
title: The Cruise of the 'Gladys'
plot_es: Four landlubbers decide to take a sailboat out, but they don't know how to sail and end up run aground and capsized.
plot_en: Four landlubbers decide to take a sailboat out, but they don't know how to sail and end up run aground and capsized.
